rows.label: bf01260150_0010
rows.name: Ah, e-excuse me...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0020
rows.name: Such a sorrowful sound...

rows.label: bf01260150_0030
rows.name: [ML:undisp ] Huh?

rows.label: bf01260150_0040
rows.name:
It hasn't stopped. Not...
Not in all these years...

rows.label: bf01260150_0050
rows.name:
Hasn't stopped... You
mean that bell sound?

rows.label: bf01260150_0060
rows.name:
Is the Acedian Holy See
nearby somewhere...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0070
rows.name: Uh... Where are we?

rows.label: bf01260150_0080
rows.name: This is...Eden.

rows.label: bf01260150_0090
rows.name:
The land where, long ago,
mankind live together with God.

rows.label: bf01260150_0100
rows.name: And...

rows.label: bf01260150_0102
rows.name: Our homeland.

rows.label: bf01260150_0110
rows.name: W-what?! This place?!

rows.label: bf01260150_0120
rows.name: ...Is that a Core Crystal...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0130
rows.name: You're a...

rows.label: bf01260150_0132
rows.name: Blade?

rows.label: bf01260150_0140
rows.name: My name is [System:Ruby rt=Meaning - Flame ]Homura[/System:Ruby].

rows.label: bf01260150_0150
rows.name: What? Oh, right! M-mine is...

rows.label: bf01260150_0160
rows.name: I know your name. You're Rex, right?

rows.label: bf01260150_0170
rows.name: How did you know my name?

rows.label: bf01260150_0180
rows.name: Just now, when we came into contact...

rows.label: bf01260150_0190
rows.name: Just now...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0200
rows.name:
Sorry... I can't seem to
remember how I got here...

rows.label: bf01260150_0210
rows.name: You were...killed.

rows.label: bf01260150_0220
rows.name: Stabbed through the heart by Shin.

rows.label: bf01260150_0230
rows.name: Shin? ...Through the...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0240
rows.name: I remember now! That bastard stabbed me!

rows.label: bf01260150_0250
rows.name:
Oh man! This is bad! Everyone
in the Guild is in danger!

rows.label: bf01260150_0260
rows.name:
No, wait! I can't do
anything if I'm dead!

rows.label: bf01260150_0270
rows.name:
Shit! If I wasn't dead
I'd kick that guy's ass!

rows.label: bf01260150_0280
rows.name: Rex, I have a favor to ask.

rows.label: bf01260150_0290
rows.name: Please...take me to Eden.

rows.label: bf01260150_0300
rows.name: Eden...? But...isn't that here?

rows.label: bf01260150_0310
rows.name:
This world is merely a memory. An ancient,
half-forgotten memory of what once was.

rows.label: bf01260150_0320
rows.name: The real Eden lies in your world...

rows.label: bf01260150_0330
rows.name:
atop the World Tree that rises
from the heart of Alst.

rows.label: bf01260150_0340
rows.name: Memory...? So it's like an illusion?

rows.label: bf01260150_0350
rows.name: But there's no way.

rows.label: bf01260150_0360
rows.name:
I'm dead, remember? How can I
help if I'm not breathing?

rows.label: bf01260150_0370
rows.name: I will give you half of my life force.

rows.label: bf01260150_0372
rows.name: That way...you can be revived...

rows.label: bf01260150_0380
rows.name: As my Driver.

rows.label: bf01260150_0382
rows.name:
As the Driver of the
Heavenly Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf01260150_0390
rows.name:
The Driver... of the
Heavenly Holy Grail?!

rows.label: bf01260150_0400
rows.name: Wh-what...?!

rows.label: bf01260150_0410
rows.name: What will you do, Rex?

rows.label: bf01260150_0420
rows.name: Is this place really your home?

rows.label: bf01260150_0430
rows.name: It is.

rows.label: bf01260150_0440
rows.name: And it really exists...?

rows.label: bf01260150_0450
rows.name: Rex, I know what you're thinking.

rows.label: bf01260150_0460
rows.name:
By...coming to this place...you
can save the world.

rows.label: bf01260150_0462
rows.name:
Save it from the slow
demise that is its fate.

rows.label: bf01260150_0470
rows.name:
We...wouldn't have to live
in fear... for the future.

rows.label: bf01260150_0480
rows.name: Then there's only one choice.

rows.label: bf01260150_0490
rows.name: I'm in. Let's go to Eden.

rows.label: bf01260150_0492
rows.name: I'll take you there myself!

rows.label: bf01260150_0500
rows.name: Thank you, Rex.

rows.label: bf01260150_0510
rows.name: Now, place your hand on my chest.

rows.label: bf01260150_0520
rows.name: What?! A-are you sure?!
